body.name: HOTAWELI Cordless Vacuum Cleaner,6-in-1 Powerful Suction Stick Vacuum with 2200 mAh Battery,Lightweight Self-Standing Vacuum Cleaner,40 Mins Runtime,Cordless for Hard Floor Carpet Pet Hair
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 23 hrs 43 mins
features: [Ultra Powerful Suction]Cordless Vacuum Cleaner featuring a 180W upgraded motor with two adjustable power modes, capable of capturing pet hair, bread crumbs, cat litter, and various weighted debris on hardwood floors, low-pile carpets, and tiles. The sponge construction of the body reduces noise (65dB), ensuring a clean environment and a quiet atmosphere.NOTE:Long-pile carpets may stop or burn outthe motor. Then you need to remove the floor brush to clean the hairs at both ends before restarting the machine.

[MAX 40-Minute Runtim]The Vacuum Cordless Cleaner is powered by six 2200mAh rechargeable batteries, offering a rapid 4.5-hour charge.It provides a runtime of 15-20 minutes (in maximum mode) to 30-40 minutes (in standard mode). The detachable battery includes a charge indicator.We recommend fully charging the battery before first and each use.The new battery need to be activated with two or three cycles of full charge.

[6-Layer High-Efficiency Filtration System]Comprised of HEPA filter cotton, stainless steel filter, double cyclonic separation, and an exhaust sponge,the Cordless Vacuum can effectively eliminating 99.99% of dust as small as 0.2 microns. Note: Regularly clean the filters/sponge to prevent weakening and clogging. Remove them before rinsing to avoid motor damage.

[Super Practical Design]With anti-toppling stability for self-standing,the Cordless Stick Vacuum Cleaner allows interruptions or breaks and ensures child safety. The 180°&90°adjustable LED-equipped floor brush doesn’t miss any dust under furniture. One-click dust cup emptying eliminates and New V-shaped anti-tangling brush make it easy to clean.No need to touch the dust.

[Multi-Functional Brushes]With a 2-in-1 brush, crevice tool, and extendable wand,you can clean various household cleaning needs like ceilings, sofa crevices, tables, curtains, and cars. The unit's weight is only 2.8 pounds, ensuring comfortable extended handheld use.
[Customer-Centric Service]We provide 10 years warranties and a 100% satisfaction guarantee for the cordless vacuum cleaner to enjoy a premium purchasing experience.

Why does it just turn on and run for 5 minutes and then stop and then won't start? If the indicator light of battery lit up in a grid cycle, it means the battery is normal. The new battery has a false charge in its initial state, we recommend fully charging the battery for at least 5 hours before first use. Why does the vacuum cleaner stop after running on the carpet for a while? This vacuum cleaner is only suitable for short-pile carpets. It will stop the main unit automatically when using on long-pile carpets or there are too many tangled hairs on brush. Then we need to clean the floor brush first to restore the main unit. Why does the battery runtime not match the description? The new battery has a false charge in its initial state, and usually has to complete two or three cycles of full charge and total depletion to achieve a learning match with the main machine unit and to get the optimal working hours. How often do I need to change my filter? White HEPA filter and black sponge can be washed and reused. They are usually suggested to be changed once every three months, in addition to the body comes with a set of HEPA filter and sponge, we have an extra set for replacement.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Game-Changer for Cleaning Efficiency!
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased this Cordless Vacuum, and I am beyond impressed with its performance. This cordless vacuum has completely revolutionized my cleaning routine, making it more efficient and hassle-free.The first thing that caught my attention was the sleek and modern design. It's not just a functional appliance but also a stylish addition to my cleaning arsenal. The lightweight and cordless design make it incredibly convenient to move around the house without being tethered to an outlet. No more tripping over cords or struggling to reach tight spaces! The compact size makes it easy to clean under furniture and other low profile areas.One of the standout features is the powerful suction. Despite its compact size, this vacuum packs a punch when it comes to picking up dirt and debris. It effortlessly tackles pet hair, crumbs, and dust on various surfaces, from hardwood floors to carpets. The adjustable suction power allows me to customize the cleaning experience based on the specific needs of each area in my home.The battery life is impressive, providing a solid cleaning session on a single charge. The indicator light is a handy feature, letting me know when it's time to recharge. The charging process is quick, so I never have to wait too long to resume my cleaning tasks.Lastly I want to mention how much my kids love this vacuum. I can get them to vacuum their rooms with ease.In conclusion, this Cordless Vacuum has exceeded my expectations. It has become an indispensable tool in maintaining a clean and tidy home. If you're looking for a reliable, efficient, and stylish cordless vacuum, I highly recommend giving this one a try. It's a game-changer for anyone seeking a convenient and powerful cleaning solution!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A lightweight vacuum cleaner that does the basic cleaning jobs done very well!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I own 2 robot cleaners in the home that run twice a week, along with one wired vacuum cleaner for special needs. However, cordless is something I always need for the convenience of quick cleaning when needed in the home. Obviously, Dyson was on our list but tried this and overall I am satisfied with it. Details in cons but still I would rate this with 5 stars just because of the value it delivers for this price. Very reasonably priced and that is the key feature.My 2 cents below:Pros:- Works great for light jobs but I can't think of using this for complete home cleaning. It is meant for spot cleaning only- It is very lightweight and anyone in the home can use it with ease- The dirt filtration system is decent but definitely doesn't compare with Dyson in any case- Multiple suction modes for various needs and it is easy to operate with just a push of a button- Super reasonably priced and delivers a lot of value- Cordless and hence makes it so convenient to clean nooks and corners- Handle has a swivel movement feature in all four directions & also it is retractable to suit various needs- Comes with a few attachments to use for different needs of cleaning- It is easy to use and also cleans the dirt bin. Handles are ergonomically designed and don't trigger pain on long use- Comes as a complete package with everything includedCons:- Not the suction power you would get in wired cleaners- I wish they included an extra replaceable battery in the set

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quiet, lightweight and cordless!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This vacuum is super light! I was surprised at how easy it was to use around the house, especially compared to my old upright. It reached under furniture and into corners with ease.Cordless and convenient no cord all around the house limited to just how far the outlet reaches. I zoomed from room to room with newfound cleaning freedom.Having two suction modes was handy. I used the max power for deep cleaning carpets and the standard mode for everyday hard floors.The 180W motor is very powerful, is also quiet even on max mode. The 45-minute runtime (on standard mode) was accurate and enough for a quick clean of the whole house, love the LED headlights lit up dust bunnies and crumbs hiding in dark corners, making sure I didn't miss anything.The dustbin empties with a simple click, and the filters are washable, which saves on buying replacements.The detachable attachments were great for reaching tight spaces like crevices in furniture and corners. I even used the crevice tool to clean out the car.Overall, lightweight, powerful, and convenient, making cleaning a breeze. The battery life is good. If you're looking for a cordless vacuum that's great for hard floors, low-pile carpets, and pet hair, I highly recommend checking this one out!
